option.name: fileSummaryMaps
option.value: {"/Users/huanghuangjian/Documents/projectwork/QQclient":"{\"/src/main/java/com/huangjian/utilities/RSAEncryption.java\":\"This file contains a utility class `RSAEncryption` that provides methods for generating RSA key pairs, encrypting and decrypting data using RSA algorithm, and converting public and private keys to and from string representations.\\n\\n`RSAEncryption`: A utility class that provides RSA encryption and decryption functionality.\\n\\n`generateKeyPair()`: Generates a new RSA key pair.\\n\\n`encrypt(String, PublicKey)`: Encrypts the given plaintext using the provided public key.\\n\\n`decrypt(String, PrivateKey)`: Decrypts the given ciphertext using the provided private key.\\n\\n`getPublicKeyFromString(String)`: Retrieves a public key from a Base64-encoded string representation.\\n\\n`getPrivateKeyFromString(String)`: Retrieves a private key from a Base64-encoded string representation.\\n\\n`getEncryptedContent(String)`: Encrypts the given plaintext using the predefined public key.\\n\\n`getDecryptedContent(String)`: Decrypts the given ciphertext using the predefined private key.\",\"/src/main/java/com/huangjian/qqcommon/User.java\":\"This file contains a single class:\\n\\n`User`: A class that represents a user with a user ID and password.\\n\\nThe file also contains the following functions:\\n\\n`User()`: The default constructor for the `User` class.\\n\\n`User(String userId, String password)`: A constructor that initializes the `userId` and `password` fields of the `User` class.\\n\\n`getPassword()`: A getter method that returns the password of the `User` object.\\n\\n`setPassword(String password)`: A setter method that sets the password of the `User` object.\\n\\n`getUserId()`: A getter method that returns the user ID of the `User` object.\\n\\n`setUserId(String userId)`: A setter method that sets the user ID of the `User` object.\",\"/src/main/java/com/huangjian/qqcommon/Message.java\":\"This file defines a `Message` class that represents a message in a chat application. The class has several properties, including the sender, receiver, content, send time, receive time, and message type. The class also implements the `Serializable` interface, which allows it to be easily transmitted over a network.\\n\\n`Message`: A class that represents a message in a chat application, with properties for the sender, receiver, content, send time, receive time, and message type.\\n\\n`getSender()`: Returns the sender of the message.\\n`setSender(String sender)`: Sets the sender of the message.\\n`getReceiver()`: Returns the receiver of the message.\\n`setReceiver(String receiver)`: Sets the receiver of the message.\\n`getContent()`: Returns the content of the message.\\n`setContent(String content)`: Sets the content of the message.\\n`getSendTime()`: Returns the send time of the message.\\n`setSendTime(LocalDate sendTime)`: Sets the send time of the message.\\n`getReceiveTime()`: Returns the receive time of the message.\\n`setReceiveTime(LocalDate receiveTime)`: Sets the receive time of the message.\\n`getMsgType()`: Returns the message type.\\n`setMsgType(String msgType)`: Sets the message type.\\n`toString()`: Returns a string representation of the message.\",\"/src/main/java/com/huangjian/qqcommon/MessageType.java\":\"This file does not contain any classes or functions. Instead, it defines a set of constants that represent different types of messages used in a messaging system. The file serves as a common interface for defining the message types used in the application.\\n\\nThe constants defined in this file are:\\n\\n`LOGIN_SUCCEED`: Indicates a successful login.\\n`LOGIN_FAIL`: Indicates a failed login.\\n`ONLINE_USER_COUNT_COMMAND`: Represents a command to retrieve the number of online users.\\n`ONLINE_USER_COUNT_SUCCEED`: Indicates a successful response to the online user count command.\\n`ONLINE_USER_COUNT_FAIL`: Indicates a failed response to the online user count command.\",\"/src/main/java/com/huangjian/view/QQview.java\":\"This file appears to be a Java class that implements a simple command-line interface for a chat application. It does not contain any classes, but it has the following functions:\\n\\n`main`: The main entry point of the application, which creates an instance of the `QQview` class and calls its `mainMenu()` function.\\n\\n`mainMenu`: The main menu of the application, which allows the user to log in, view online users, send group messages, initiate private chats, and send files. It also handles the user\\u0027s logout and exit from the application.\\n\\n`islogin`: A function that checks the user\\u0027s login credentials and returns a `Login` object indicating whether the login was successful.\\n\\n`getOnlineUserCount`: A function that retrieves the count of online users and displays it to the user.\\n\\nThe file also imports several classes and utilities from other packages, such as `Login`, `ClientLoginService`, `ProtocalUtilities`, and `Utility`.\",\"/src/main/java/com/huangjian/utilities/ProtocalUtilities.java\":\"This file contains a utility class `ProtocalUtilities` that provides a method to send a message to the server to retrieve the online user count.\\n\\n`ProtocalUtilities`: A utility class that provides methods for handling protocol-related operations.\\n\\n`getOnlineUserCount(String userId)`: Sends a message to the server to retrieve the online user count for the specified user ID.\",\"/src/test/java/com/huangjian/AppTest.java\":\"This file is a unit test for the `App` class in the `com.huangjian` package. It contains the following:\\n\\n`AppTest`: A test case class that extends `TestCase` and provides a suite of tests for the `App` class.\\n\\n`AppTest(String testName)`: A constructor that creates a new instance of the `AppTest` class with the given test name.\\n\\n`suite()`: A static method that returns a `TestSuite` containing all the tests defined in the `AppTest` class.\\n\\n`testApp()`: A test method that checks if the condition `true` is true, which is a simple test that always passes.\\n\\nOverall, this file sets up a test suite for the `App` class and includes a single test method that always passes. The purpose of this file is to provide a basic unit test for the `App` class.\",\"/src/main/java/com/huangjian/utilities/RetainSocketThread.java\":\"`RetainSocketThread`: A thread that maintains a persistent connection with the server and receives messages from the server.\\n\\n`run()`: The main method of the `RetainSocketThread` class that continuously listens for and processes messages from the server.\\n\\n`getSocket()`: A getter method that returns the `Socket` object associated with the `RetainSocketThread`.\\n\\nThis file contains a single class, `RetainSocketThread`, which is responsible for maintaining a persistent connection with a server and receiving messages from the server. The class extends the `Thread` class and overrides the `run()` method to continuously listen for and process messages from the server. The `getSocket()` method is a simple getter that returns the `Socket` object associated with the `RetainSocketThread`.\",\"/src/main/java/com/huangjian/dto/Login.java\":\"This file contains a single class `Login` which represents the login status and the associated socket connection for a user.\\n\\n`Login`: A class that represents the login status and the associated socket connection for a user.\\n\\n`isLogin()`: A method that returns the login status of the user.\\n\\n`setLogin(boolean login)`: A method that sets the login status of the user.\\n\\n`getSocket()`: A method that returns the socket connection associated with the user.\\n\\n`setSocket(Socket socket)`: A method that sets the socket connection associated with the user.\",\"/src/main/java/com/huangjian/service/ClientLoginService.java\":\"This file contains a single class `ClientLoginService` and several functions within it.\\n\\n`ClientLoginService`: This class handles the client-side login process for a chat application.\\n\\n`islogin(String userId, String password)`: This function attempts to log in a user with the provided user ID and password, and returns a `Login` object containing the login status and the socket connection.\\n\\nThe file as a whole provides the client-side implementation for the login process in a chat application, including encryption of the user credentials, communication with the server, and management of the socket connection.\",\"/src/main/java/com/huangjian/utilities/Utility.java\":\"This file contains a utility class named `Utility` that provides various methods for handling user input in a console-based application.\\n\\n`Utility`: A utility class that provides methods for reading and validating user input from the console.\\n\\n`readMenuSelection()`: Reads a menu selection from the user, ensuring that the input is within the range of 1 to 5.\\n\\n`readChar()`: Reads a single character from the user.\\n\\n`readChar(char defaultValue)`: Reads a single character from the user, returning the default value if the user presses Enter.\\n\\n`readInt()`: Reads an integer from the user, ensuring that the input is a valid integer.\\n\\n`readInt(int defaultValue)`: Reads an integer from the user, returning the default value if the user presses Enter.\\n\\n`readString(int limit)`: Reads a string from the user, ensuring that the input does not exceed the specified length.\\n\\n`readString(int limit, String defaultValue)`: Reads a string from the user, returning the default value if the user presses Enter.\\n\\n`readConfirmSelection()`: Reads a confirmation selection (Y/N) from the user.\\n\\n`readKeyBoard(int limit, boolean blankReturn)`: A private method that handles the actual reading of user input from the console, with options to allow or disallow blank input.\",\"/src/main/java/com/huangjian/dto/PublicPrivateKey.java\":\"`PublicPrivateKey`: A class that represents a pair of public and private keys.\\n\\n`getPublicKey()`: Returns the public key.\\n`setPublicKey(String publicKey)`: Sets the public key.\\n`getPrivateKey()`: Returns the private key.\\n`setPrivateKey(String privateKey)`: Sets the private key.\\n\\nThis file defines a simple Java class `PublicPrivateKey` that encapsulates a pair of public and private keys, providing getter and setter methods to access and modify these keys.\",\"/src/main/java/com/huangjian/utilities/ManageSocketThreadCollection.java\":\"This file contains a utility class `ManageSocketThreadCollection` that manages a collection of `RetainSocketThread` objects using a `ConcurrentHashMap`.\\n\\n`ManageSocketThreadCollection`: A utility class that manages a collection of `RetainSocketThread` objects using a `ConcurrentHashMap`.\\n\\n`getThreadSocket(String userId)`: Retrieves the `RetainSocketThread` object associated with the given `userId`.\\n\\n`putThreadSocket(String userId, RetainSocketThread thread)`: Adds or updates the `RetainSocketThread` object associated with the given `userId`.\\n\\n`removeThreadSocket(String userId)`: Removes the `RetainSocketThread` object associated with the given `userId`.\"}"}
